summary: Memorandum regarding audio surveillance of Manuel F. ARTIME Buesa at a safehouse in Bethesda, Maryland. The memo details the plan to install microphones and a telephone tap in the house to monitor conversations between ARTIME and Rafael Aurelio QUINTERO Ibarbia. It also discusses the cover story to be used during the installation and the servicing of the recording equipment.
title: Manuel F. ARTIME Buesa Audio Surveillance
